quotes.quote: It is hard to believe that a man is telling the truth when you know that you would lie if you were in his place.
If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
Make yourself an honest man, and then you may be sure there is one less rascal in the world.
Honesty is the rarest wealth anyone can possess, and yet all the honesty in the world ain't lawful tender for a loaf of bread.
I never lie because I don't fear anyone. You only lie when you're afraid.

The Five Levels of Truth-Telling: First, you tell the truth to yourself about yourself. Then you tell the truth to yourself about another. At the third level, you tell the truth about yourself to another. Then you tell your truth about another to that other. And finally, you tell the truth to everyone about everything.
No legacy is so rich as Honesty.
Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
Truth is such a rare thing, it is delighted to tell it.
When in doubt, tell the Truth.
If you wish to astonish the whole world, tell the simple truth.
A truth that's told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent.
The truth will set you free, but first it will make you miserable.
Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.
Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it.
Truthful lips endure forever, but a lying tongue is but for a moment.
These are the things that you shall do: Speak the truth to one another; render in your gates judgments that are true and make for peace;
Rather, speaking the truth in love, we are to grow up in every way into him who is the head, into Christ,
Therefore, having put away falsehood, let each one of you speak the truth with his neighbor, for we are members one of another.
Never be afraid to raise your voice for honesty and truth and compassion against injustice and lying and greed. If people all over the world would do this, it would change the earth.
When a woman tells the truth, she creates the possibility for more truth around her.
Honesty is more than not lying. It is truth telling, truth speaking, truth living, and truth loving.
Proclaim the truth and do not be silent through fear.
But I suppose the most revolutionary act one can engage in is  to tell the truth.
I would rather be blamed for telling the truththan freed for telling a lie.
It is an occupational hazard that anyone who has spent her life learning how to lie eventually becomes bad at telling the truth.
I dont think theres anything wrong with telling the truth. I know it isnt fashionable.
Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty istelling the truth to other people.
In a time of universal deceit - telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
Tell the truth boldly, whether it hurts or not. Never pander to weakness. If truth is too much for intelligent people and sweeps them away, let them go; the sooner the better.
